name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic tale of life in America's unforgiving heartland, featuring a vast and atmospheric world where your choices matter.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

name: God of War
description: A new beginning for Kratos as he embarks on an emotional journey with his son Atreus through the Norse realms.

name: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game that allows players to build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated world.
